text: ivarkal pumiyil pirayanam ceytu ivarkalukku mun iruntavarkalin mutivu eppatiyiruntatu enpataip parkka villaiya? Avarkal, palattalum, pumiyil (vittuc cenra purva)cinnankalalum ivarkalaivita valimaiyutaiyavarkalakave iruntarkal - anal avarkalin pavankalin karanamaka avarkalai allah pitittuk kontan; innum allahvitamiruntu avarkalaik kapparra evarum illai
